transcript: saturation in any space means that people who are the best are going to win because people have more options and so that's why creating more trust before the purchase is more important now than it was before 5 years ago people could just run ads know knew who you were and you could go make a million bucks a month with nothing now the amount of value delivered before the call dictates how many people actually trust that what you say is true it's not hard to get 20 screenshots and say look I'm making people money that is why I mean if you do what I do rather than what I say there's a reason I went all in on making content
